law.catch_line: Regardless of whether a site and facility are approved by a subdivision or are certified under this ...
law.text:
Regardless of whether a site and facility are approved by a subdivision or are certified under this subtitle:
All other requirements for permits by State health or any other State regulatory agency remain applicable; and
All other State environmental, health, and safety restrictions shall apply, as provided in § 7-405(c) of this subtitle.
